thread.title: The depths of Puerto Rico's housing crisis exposed by Maria

title: The depths of Puerto Rico's housing crisis exposed by Maria
text:
The depths of Puerto Rico's housing crisis exposed by Maria 9:04am EST - 02:09 
Officials are faced with the dilemma on how to bring Puerto Rico's housing up to code to ensure history doesn't repeat itself, after Hurricane Maria decimated over half of residents' homes -- many of which were built illegally in the first place.
